sentences.sContent: As the last Ice Age came to an end, somebody picked a pebble out of a small river not far from Bethlehem.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the last Ice Age came to an end, somebody picked a pebble out of a small river not far from Bethlehem.
sentences.sCn: 随着最后一个冰河时代宣告结束，有人从伯利恒附近流水淙淙的小溪边，捡起了一枚鹅卵石。

sentences.sContent: And what I do is, I select a hard stone hammer, in this case a quartzite pebble about the size of a cricket ball, and I elect to hit it in one place - and this is where I start to knap.
sentences.sContent_eng: And what I do is, I select a hard stone hammer, in this case a quartzite pebble about the size of a cricket ball, and I elect to hit it in one place - and this is where I start to knap.
sentences.sCn: “现在你瞧瞧，这儿呢，我挑了块燧石，比较细长的，要削薄下来工作量并不大。” “我要做的就是，选择一块够硬的石锤，这次我选这块是个头有板球大小的石英岩卵石。

words.tran: 多卵石的；有卵石花纹的
